title: Implement Code Analysis Engine
description: Develop the core code analysis engine that can parse and analyze code in various programming languages.

title: Integrate with Version Control Systems
description: Implement integration with popular version control systems (e.g., Git) to fetch pull requests and code changes.

title: Develop AI-powered Suggestion System
description: Create an AI model that can generate improvement suggestions based on code analysis results.

title: Implement Security Vulnerability Detection
description: Add functionality to detect potential security vulnerabilities in the analyzed code.

title: Create User Interface for Code Review Results
description: Develop a user-friendly interface to display code review results, suggestions, and security warnings.
